nameEn: Dry laundries with sunlight and natural breezes
nameZhTW: 利用日光與自然風乾衣

nameEn: Do laundry with a full load
nameZhTW: 儲滿一機衣物才開動洗衣機

nameEn: Leave room doors and windows open for better ventilation
nameZhTW: 打開房門窗，增加空氣流動

nameEn: Use other methods to substitute using air-conditioning/heater
nameZhTW: 以其他方法代替開冷氣/暖氣
開冷氣時配合使用風扇

nameEn: Switch off or unplug idle electronic appliances
nameZhTW: 將無用的電器電源關掉或將其插頭拔除

nameEn: Use the stairs instead of escalators or lifts
nameZhTW: 使用樓梯代替電梯或扶手電梯

nameEn: Go for a walk/do outdoor activities
nameZhTW: 到戶外活動一下/散散步
